Structs/SnazzyCollectionCellConfigurator.name: SnazzyCollectionCellConfigurator
Structs/SnazzyCollectionCellConfigurator.abstract: This struct represents your cells for the UICollectionView, you must create on instance of this struct for each cell that you want to show in your UICollectionView.

Structs/SnazzyTableCellConfigurator.html.name: SnazzyTableCellConfigurator
Structs/SnazzyTableCellConfigurator.html.abstract: This struct represents your cells for the UITableView, you must create on instance of this struct for each cell that you want to show in your UITableView.

Protocols/SnazzyTableHeaderProtocol.html.name: tableView(_:viewForHeaderInSection:with:)
Protocols/SnazzyTableHeaderProtocol.html.abstract: This method will be called whenever the UITableView will call the viewForHeaderInSection.

Protocols/SnazzyTableFooterProtocol.html.name: tableView(_:viewForFooterInSection:with:)
Protocols/SnazzyTableFooterProtocol.html.abstract: This method will be called whenever the UITableView will call the viewForFooterInSection.

Protocols/SnazzyTableCellProtocol.html#/.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:with:)
Protocols/SnazzyTableCellProtocol.html#/.abstract: This method will be called whenever the UITableView will call the cellForRowAt.

Protocols/SnazzyCollectionCellProtocol.h.name: collectionView(collectionView:cellForItemAt:with:)
Protocols/SnazzyCollectionCellProtocol.h.abstract: This method will be called whenever the UICollectionView will call the cellForItemAt.

Protocols/SnazzyCollectionCellProtocol.h.name: SnazzyCollectionCellProtocol
Protocols/SnazzyCollectionCellProtocol.h.abstract: A Protocol that must be implemented in all your UICollectionViewCell.

Protocols/SnazzyCollectionCellSelfSizing.name: SnazzyCollectionCellSelfSizingProtocol
Protocols/SnazzyCollectionCellSelfSizing.abstract: A Protocol that must be implemented in all your UICollectionViewCell that would response for their own size.

Protocols/SnazzyCollectionFooterSelfSizi.name: SnazzyCollectionFooterSelfSizingProtocol
Protocols/SnazzyCollectionFooterSelfSizi.abstract: A Protocol that must be implemented in all your footers UICollectionReusableView that would response for their own size.

Protocols/SnazzyCollectionHeaderSelfSizi.name: SnazzyCollectionHeaderSelfSizingProtocol
Protocols/SnazzyCollectionHeaderSelfSizi.abstract: A Protocol that must be implemented in all your headers UICollectionReusableView that would response for their own size.

Protocols/SnazzyCollectionReusableProtoc.name: SnazzyCollectionReusableProtocol
Protocols/SnazzyCollectionReusableProtoc.abstract: A Protocol that must be implemented in all your headers/footers UICollectionReusableView.

Protocols/SnazzyTableCellProtocol.html.name: SnazzyTableCellProtocol
Protocols/SnazzyTableCellProtocol.html.abstract: A Protocol that must be implemented in all your UITableViewCell.

Protocols/SnazzyTableFooterProtocol.html.name: SnazzyTableFooterProtocol
Protocols/SnazzyTableFooterProtocol.html.abstract: A Protocol that must be implemented in all your footers.

Protocols/SnazzyTableHeaderProtocol.html.name: SnazzyTableHeaderProtocol
Protocols/SnazzyTableHeaderProtocol.html.abstract: A Protocol that must be implemented in all your headers.

Extensions/UICollectionViewCell.html#/s:.name: selfSizing(desiredWidth:)
Extensions/UICollectionViewCell.html#/s:.abstract: A helper method for getting the minimum size for the UICollectionViewCell.

Enums/SnazzyCellOriginType.html.name: SnazzyCellOriginType
Enums/SnazzyCellOriginType.html.abstract: An option for specifing if the cell was designed by Code or by Xib File.

Enums/SnazzyCollectionCellType.html.name: SnazzyCollectionCellType
Enums/SnazzyCollectionCellType.html.abstract: An option for what kind of cell you want to add.

Enums/SnazzyCollectionSizingType.html.name: SnazzyCollectionSizingType
Enums/SnazzyCollectionSizingType.html.abstract: An option for what kind of sizing option you want for every configFile.

Enums/SnazzyLocationPosition.html.name: SnazzyLocationPosition
Enums/SnazzyLocationPosition.html.abstract: An option for getting the location for method, after or before.

Enums/SnazzyTableCellType.html.name: SnazzyTableCellType
Enums/SnazzyTableCellType.html.abstract: An option for what kind of cell you want to add.

Enums/SnazzyTableSizingType.html.name: SnazzyTableSizingType
Enums/SnazzyTableSizingType.html.abstract: An option for what kind of sizing option you want for every configFile.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: configFiles
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: All the configFiles are going to be stored in this property.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: init(tableView:configFiles:sectionIndexTitles:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: Creates a new instance of the SnazzyTableViewDataSource.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: numberOfSections(in:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: sectionIndexTitles(for:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: tableView(_:commit:forRowAt:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: tableView(_:canEditRowAt:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: reload()
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will reload the UICollectionView, without animations.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: reloadAt(section:animation:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will reload an specific section at the UICollectionView, animated.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: reloadAtSections(indexSet:animation:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will reload sections at the UICollectionView, animated.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: reloadAt(indexPaths:animation:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will reload the specified indexPaths at the UICollectionView, animated.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: reloadAt(indexPath:animation:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will reload the UICollectionView for the specified IndexPath

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: deleteRow(with:filter:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will delete only one cell for the specified filter.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: deleteAllRowsAt(section:with:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will delete all cells at the specified section.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: insertRows(configFiles:with:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will insert all the cells specified at configFiles.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: insertRow(configFile:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will insert the cell specified at configFile.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: insertRowsAtTopOfEachSection(configFiles:with:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will insert all the configFiles specified at the parameter configFiles at top of each section corresponding to each section respecting the order within each section.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: insertRowAtTopOfSection(configFile:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will insert the configFile specified at the parameter configFile at top of its section.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.name: getIndexPath(by:)
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html#/.abstract: This method will retrieve the IndexPath given by the filter. If the filter don’t match any result it will return nil, on the other hand if the filter matches multiple results it will retrieve the first one.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDelegate.htm.name: cellIsGoingOutWithProgress(offsetY:cell:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDelegate.htm.abstract: This method will return the offset of the cell specified in the filter parameter.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: configFiles
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: All the configFiles are going to be stored in this property.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: init(collectionView:configFiles:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: Creates a new instance of the SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: collectionView(_:cellForItemAt:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: numberOfSections(in:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: collectionView(_:numberOfItemsInSection:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: collectionView(_:viewForSupplementaryElementOfKind:at:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: Internal Method for correct operation of SnazzyList.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: reload()
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will reload the UICollectionView, without animations.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: reloadAt(section:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will reload an specific section at the UICollectionView, animated.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: reloadAtSections(indexSet:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will reload sections at the UICollectionView, animated.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: reloadAt(indexPaths:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will reload the specified indexPaths at the UICollectionView, animated.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: reloadAt(indexPath:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will reload the UICollectionView for the specified IndexPath

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: deleteCell(by:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will delete only one cell for the specified filter.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: deleteAllCellsAt(section:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will delete all cells at the specified section.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: delete(at:andInsert:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will delete all cells at the specified section. Then it will insert all the configFiles specified at the configFiles parameter.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: deleteSections(greaterOrEqualTo:andInsert:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will delete all cells that are equal or greather than the specified section. Then it will insert all the configFiles specified at the configFiles parameter.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: insertCells(configFiles:maxSectionInsertedOpt:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will insert all the cells specified at configFiles.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: insertCell(configFile:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will insert the cell specified at configFile.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: insertCellAtLocation(locationPosition:filter:configFile:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will insert one cell at the specified location.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: insertCellsAtTopOfEachSection(configFiles:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will insert all the configFiles specified at the parameter configFiles at top of each section corresponding to each section respecting the order within each section.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: insertCellAtTopOfSection(configFile:completion:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will insert the configFile specified at the parameter configFile at top of its section.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: getIndexPath(by:)
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: This method will retrieve the IndexPath given by the filter. If the filter don’t match any result it will return nil, on the other hand if the filter matches multiple results it will retrieve the first one.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.name: SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource.h.abstract: An instance of SnazzyCollectionViewDataSource is responsable for responding the methods that the collection view needs in order to display all the cells properly. You must have this instance in your desired UIViewController.

Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDelegate.htm.name: SnazzyCollectionViewDelegate
Classes/SnazzyCollectionViewDelegate.htm.abstract: An instance of SnazzyCollectionViewDelegate is responsable for responding the methods that the collection view needs in order to display all the cells properly. You must have this instance in your desired UIViewController.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html.name: SnazzyTableViewDataSource
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDataSource.html.abstract: An instance of SnazzyTableViewDataSource is responsable for responding the methods that the collection view needs in order to display all the cells properly. You must have this instance in your desired UIViewController.

Classes/SnazzyTableViewDelegate.html.name: SnazzyTableViewDelegate
Classes/SnazzyTableViewDelegate.html.abstract: An instance of SnazzyCollectionViewDelegate is responsable for responding the methods that the collection view needs in order to display all the cells properly. You must have this instance in your desired UIViewController.
